sourcesContent:
import { ShipTexture, StarbaseTexture, UsersTexture, UserTexture } from "images/textures"
import { MIPMAP_MODES, Sprite, Texture } from "pixi.js"
import { AnchorContainer } from "sprites/util/AnchorContainer"
import TextSprite from "sprites/game/TextSprite"

export enum IconCounterType {
	STARBASE = 'starbase',
	SPACESHIP = 'spaceship',
	USER = 'user',
	TEAM = 'team',
}

export interface Stat {
	preIcon: IconCounterType,
	text: string,
	icon: IconCounterType
}

export default class IconText extends AnchorContainer {

	private _preIcon: Sprite
	private _text: TextSprite
	private _icon: Sprite

    constructor(stat: Stat) {
		super()

		const preIconTexture = Texture.from(this.getTexture(stat.preIcon))
		preIconTexture.baseTexture.mipmap = MIPMAP_MODES.POW2;

		this._preIcon = new Sprite(preIconTexture)
		this._preIcon.anchor.set(0, 0.5)
		this._preIcon.width = 8
		this._preIcon.height = 8
		this.addChild(this._preIcon)

		this._text = new TextSprite(stat.text, 8, 0, 0.5)
		this._text.x = 12
		this.addChild(this._text)

        const texture = Texture.from(this.getTexture(stat.icon))
		texture.baseTexture.mipmap = MIPMAP_MODES.POW2;

        this._icon = new Sprite(texture)
		this._icon.anchor.set(0, 0.5)
		this._icon.angle = -90
		this._icon.x = this._text.x + this._text.width + 10
		this._icon.y = 12
		this._icon.width = 24
		this._icon.height = 24
		this.addChild(this._icon)
    }
	
	getTexture(icon: IconCounterType): string {
		switch(icon) {
			case IconCounterType.SPACESHIP:
				return ShipTexture
			case IconCounterType.USER:
				return UserTexture
			case IconCounterType.TEAM:
				return UsersTexture
			case IconCounterType.STARBASE:
				return StarbaseTexture
		}
	}

}
